      • createItem

        public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack createItem(org.bukkit.Material material,
                                        int data,
                                        int amount,
                                        java.lang.String name,
                                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lore)
        Creates an item.
        Parameters:
        material - The material of the item.
        data - item data you want the item to be at.
        amount - amount of the item.
        name - item name you want null for no name.
        lore - the lore you want null for no lore.
        Returns:
        the item.
